channel.title: Adding anims to items? Making specials?
channel.description:
How do i add anims to weps? When i use (example) boxing gloves, i stand as if i wre unarmed. How do i change it to real rs one? [DELTA]
And, how do i make special attacks?
[DELTA]

item.title: Adding anims to items? Making specials?
item.dc:creator: @jake_cake jake cake
item.description:
@jake_cake wrote:

I was wondering the same thing about special attacks. I need to add vls and stat hammer special on my 317 server

Read full topic
